chapter.title: OpenDJ Compatibility
chapter.para: This chapter covers both major changes to existing functionality, and also deprecated and removed functionality.

section.title: Major Changes to Existing Functionality
section.para: The ldif-diff command has been renamed ldifdiff, and the --outputLDIF, --overwriteExisting, --sourceLDIF, --targetLDIF options have been dropped in favor of a format closer to that of the diff command.

section.title: Deprecated Functionality
section.para: OpenDJ makes use of new environment variables aligned with the project name. Use of the old variables is deprecated. The old variables are likely to be removed in a future release.

section.title: Removed Functionality
section.para: No functionality has been removed in OpenDJ .
No functionality is planned to be removed at this time.
